data.title: MANAGEMENT
data.text:
With more than 20 years of experience, Tomer is the CEO of ScaleIL. Before joining ScaleIL, Tomer served as Wind River’s Sales Director for the Middle East focusing on Aerospace and HLS markets. Before Wind River, Tomer served as the COO of Next Nine focusing on defining and executing the company IoT strategy. Prior to that Tomer spent more than 10 years with Mercury Interactive, (acquired by HP), where he gained extensive global field management experience. Tomer managed segment of America’s presales organization and later headed the Mercury Interactive’s technical field operations in Asia Pacific. Tomer holds a B.A. in computer science from Tel Aviv University and MBA from San Jose University in California.

​

Tomer.Bogin@ScaleIL.com

M: +972-54-5597070

Amir drives ScaleIL sales and business development in the Telecom and Cloud markets. Amir is a seasoned executive with 20 years of experience in technical, sales and business development positions. Prior to joining ScaleIL, Amir served as Wind River’s head of networking sales in Israel focusing on the company’s growth solutions. Amir previously held sales positions in CheckPoint Software (Nasdaq CHKP) and more than a decade at Bynet Data Communication in several sales and technical roles. Amir holds a B.A. in computer science and business management from the Open University and CCIE from Cisco Systems.

​

​

​

​

​

Amir.Erez@ScaleIL.com

M: +972-52-6652070

Yehuda brings over two decades of experience to the table, specializing in RTOS, Linux, firmware and BSP development.

With a rich background spanning leading companies such as Compax, Elbit, and Wind River, Yehuda spearheaded several Land and Control, Avionic and UAV projects in the Aerospace and Defense industry, as well as certification projects.

Now at Scaleil, Yehuda leads solution consulting and design, constantly seeking new and exciting innovations to bring to market.

With a passion for cutting-edge technology, he drives excellence and pushes boundaries in all endeavors.

Yehuda holds B.Sc. in computer science from the Jerusalem College of Technology - (JCT).

​

​

​

Yehuda.Marko@ScaleIL.com

M: +972-54-4373003
